text:
@HillaryClinton Quite correct. In fact doing what they did in Taiwan, S. Korea, Greece, New Zealand, etc would have saved thousands of lives.  Same with Britain where our Trump lookalike screwed it up too. Here are the numbers - and Britain’s are a 100% underestimate.
